properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL ) VALUES ( MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME = ?
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ENROLLE_DATE , STATUS , INTRODUCE , REPORT_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ENROLLE_DATE , STATUS , INTRODUCE , REPORT_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
